questionTitle: Which of the following can be referred to as productivity software?
questionExplanation: Productivity software is an archaic term based on office suites.

questionOption1: Management of cloud storage is performed by out-of-band management systems through a data storage interface
questionOption2: Out-of-band refers to a management console that isn’t on the storage network
questionOption3: Out-of-band is most often on an Ethernet network inside a browser
questionExplanation: From the management console, additional data services such as cloning, compression, de-duplication, and snapshots may be invoked.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be tagged as frequently used secondary category applications?
questionExplanation: Graphics modules, most often bitmapped or paint programs is also considered as second category application.

questionTitle: Which of the following is characteristic of productivity software?

questionOption1: A CDMI container can be exported and then used as a virtual disk by Virtual Machines in the cloud
questionOption2: CDMI and OCCI are meant to interoperate
questionOption3: The cloud infrastructure management console can be used to attach exported CDMI containers to the Virtual Machine that is desired
questionExplanation: CDMI exports containers so the information that is obtained from the OCCI interface is part of the exported container.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the disadvantage of online office suite?
questionOption4: An Internet connection is required to access your documents
questionExplanation: Some cloud-based applications now offer what is called an “offline” mode so you can work on documents on your local system when an Internet connection is not available.

questionTitle: Which of the following benefit is provided by the cloud computing office suite?
questionExplanation: Data in the cloud can be lost and must be managed and backed up.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Adobe’s application suite of cloud-based applications?
questionExplanation: Adobe’s offerings on Acrobat.com are centered around preparing documents, manipulating graphics, and publishing the results.

questionTitle: Which of the following tool cannot be found at Acrobat.com?
questionExplanation: ConnectNow is an online conferencing and collaboration service.

questionTitle: Which of the following Acrobat word processor offers a capable set of office applications and makes good use of Adobe Flash animation in its interface?
questionExplanation: Buzzword is strong in graphical capabilities.
